verbs.description: With [ARG0: a graciousness] [R-ARG0: that] [V: impressed] [ARG1: critics] and brought supporters to tears , Michelle Obama on Monday night gave a perfectly pitched convention speech that was a ringing endorsement of Hillary Clinton , a backhanded slap at Donald Trump , and a powerful reminder of the historic nature of her husband ’s presidency .
